TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content: You might want to take that link out of your sig, considering what it now leads to.
Will finish \'The Test\' later in preparation.
can you resend me the test cos i deleated it thinking we were changeing it

Alright people, I have a few things to say - 

1. Keep it under control. Any more flame-baiting here will be dealt with, be it at the personal level or complete thread locking.

2. I do not need another server, all of the problems so far have been resolved, and the website is still being uploaded from the backup

3. Popeter, stop. I have no plans at the moment of getting the moderation team above 5 for now, and frankly, you are the last person I would select for entry.

4. I will not be posting the website until I am sure it works perfectly. Be that today, or in the next century.

5. Yes, Ascensiam, I will have a 0-tolerance policy for flaming, and that will be made perfectly clear.
Oh, I sent popeter the test in case he wants to try and re-take it.
Who is the current moderation team? ( apart from Charzy, Radion and Ascensiam) if there are any others.

> 
> Oh, I sent popeter the test in case he wants to try and re-take it.

I meant entry into the moderation team. If he can pass the test, he can come in (although any slip ups will be acted upon.).

> 
> Who is the current moderation team? ( apart from Charzy, Radion and Ascensiam) if there are any others.

Currently, its

Radion (me, hehe)

Charzy

Lord Wasteland

Ascensiam (I do believe he accepted being a moderator some time ago, not sure about the current status).

> 
> I meant entry into the moderation team. If he can pass the test, he can come in (although any slip ups will be acted upon.).
> 
> Currently, its
> 
> Radion (me, hehe)
> 
> Charzy
> 
> Lord Wasteland
> 
> Ascensiam (I do believe he accepted being a moderator some time ago, not sure about the current status).

Ok ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Now let\'s hope I can finally do the test right ^.^

Well, I don\'t think the site will be able to go live today. PHPmyAdmin is throwing up errors for the final part of the website upload, the actual posts of users. The final part is important or the entire site will be lost, so I\'m going to be very careful with this one. It appeared that the file was too big, so I\'ve split it up into separate files and am preparing them for upload.

let me see these errors i may be able to tell what they are

ooc: i get my second modarator job today!

though i left my old one 3-4 years ago

first one was my old primary school

and today the new unofficial ksp forum!

> 
> let me see these errors i may be able to tell what they are
> 
> ooc: i get my second modarator job today!
> 
> though i left my old one 3-4 years ago
> 
> first one was my old primary school
> 
> and today the new unofficial ksp forum!

Wait, Radion\'s of Joey\'s?

If Joey\'s, then I warn you that practically nobody is going to go there, other than people who get banned from this forum and the one Radion is making, or fail the test on Radion\'s. Why would they go worse when they can go better?

its only joeys off-topic and as will see i am not at all strict

ps YOU are a member of that forum
And? I registered so that I could look around better. It\'s still most likely only going to be a place where people go after they get banned.

Will you guys stop posting off-topic comments! If it continues like this, this will be locked, so stop messing around, and popeter, please don\'t post anything on this to get people into a flame war. Thank you.
Any update on how the uploading\'s going? I can\'t wait until it goes back online again ^.^

I hereby declare my official hatred for PHP, no matter how useful it is at times. The script keeps timing out before the website can be loaded in. Really, that\'s all that\'s left to do. Needless to say, I\'ll keep trying.

> 
> I hereby declare my official hatred for PHP, no matter how useful it is at times. The script keeps timing out before the website can be loaded in. Really, that\'s all that\'s left to do. Needless to say, I\'ll keep trying.

Well, good luck ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I imagine by now my nation\'s space race is near completion...

Soon...soon...

Any progress reports, Radion?

Like I said in a certain PM.

[Soon.](http://www.wowwiki.com/Soon)
You know, Gabe Newell soon.

Not long now ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Radion, did you manage to get the files you were working on uploaded before it timed out, or are you still working on it?

> 
> Not long now ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Radion, did you manage to get the files you were working on uploaded before it timed out, or are you still working on it?

It\'s half loaded, which is not good, because when left half loaded the site decides to break itself. I\'m trying to figure out how to load it all at once.
Can\'t you just start over with the threads and boards? It\'s honesty starting to sound like less work and trouble.

> 
> Can\'t you just start over with the threads and boards? It\'s honesty starting to sound like less work and trouble.

Perhaps, although I\'d need another few days to get all of the rules and regulations re-written, the maps re uploaded, the data redone, the members re-registered, and clearing the database so I can reinstall SMF. I\'ll see.

> 
> Can\'t you just start over with the threads and boards? It\'s honesty starting to sound like less work and trouble.

But... But... But that\'d make us lose our nations ...
